description:
Tucked away on a quiet street in Carina and exceptionally presented, this gorgeous character home is the perfect find for a professional couple or young family wanting an easy-to-maintain property in a popular precinct! Spend your weekends entertaining at home or enjoying the delights of the area with shops, golf clubs, parks, restaurants and the city all within minutes.

Flowing across two levels, it starts with a peaceful living and dining area upstairs. It has soft neutral tones, high ceilings, polished timber floors, casement windows and the comfort of air-conditioning. The superb kitchen has stone benchtops, stylish cabinetry, a Bosch dishwasher, a cooktop and an oven, plus a servery window to the spacious deck, ideal for hosting friends and family.

This level has three bedrooms; the main bedroom has air-conditioning, a built-in robe and a lovely ensuite. The two additional bedrooms also feature built-ins and have their own bathroom steps away with quality appointments.

Downstairs offers flexibility and extra room to grow! It encompasses a second spacious living area that opens via French doors to an under-deck patio. There is also a generous 4th bedroom with air-conditioning, which could also make a great office with easy external access for clients.

There is a laundry with a separate toilet nearby and this floor has enteral access to the single garage and there is extra storage under the stairs.

You will love the easy drive to Westfield Carindale, Carina Marketplace, various local shops, restaurants, cafes and places to grab a coffee on the way to work. It is nearby Carina State School, San Sisto College, St Martin's Catholic Primary School and childcare centres. It is serviced by buses or an easy trip to the Gateway Motorway and Brisbane Airport.

Speak to Pat and Jewlie today!
